Title: S6 Ep. 251 - Alex Salas: How Multiple Career Choices Prepare You For Your Future
Description: Alex Salas is my guest this week and his story of how he got into #instructionaldesign as a career is interesting because it had some twists and turns that shaped him into a man that chose to question and seek answers that developed curious minds. When asked what his five words are that described him and why, you will better understand the mentoring advice that she shared at the end of the episode. Wondering what his five words are? Resilient, passionate, philosopher, pragmatic, and loving. Hear more about his take on #ChatGPT and why we need to exercise our minds.   Tune into this week’s Intern Whisperer podcast episode to learn more about this former #Navy hospital corpsman transitioned to the position of talent learning designer.   The Intern Whisperer Podcast is brought to you by Employers 4 Change - Increasing diversity through #Skills based #DiversityEquityInclusion #recruitment and #management for #interns and #employees alike. Apply today to be an #Employer4Change that invests in #intern #talent and #employees. Want a break? Play Intern Pursuit Game on Steam.  Thank you to our sponsor Cat 5 Studios.
